sense.gloss: to destroy, to demolish, to pull down, to tear down, to level
to disturb, to put into disorder, to throw off balance, to make shaky
to relax (one's pose), to make oneself at ease
to break (a bill), to change, to make change
to write in cursive style, to write in running style
to break into a smile, to let off a smile

sdata.j: たまには↑休↑↓やす↓まないと、↑体調↑↓たいちょう↓を↑崩↑↓|くず↓す|よ。
sdata.e: If you don't rest once in a while, you'll get sick.

sdata.j: たまには↑休↑↓やす↓まないと、↑体調↑↓たいちょう↓を↑崩↑↓|くず↓す|よ。
sdata.e: If you don't take a break once in a while, you'll get sick.

sdata.j: そんなに↑頑張↑↓がんば↓ったら、↑体調↑↓たいちょう↓↑崩↑↓|くず↓す|よ。
sdata.e: If you work that hard, you're going to burn out.

sdata.j: そんなに↑頑張↑↓がんば↓ったら、↑体調↑↓たいちょう↓↑崩↑↓|くず↓す|よ。
sdata.e: If you put that much effort in, your body's going to collapse.

sdata.j: ↑折角↑↓せっかく↓ここまで↑頑張↑↓がんば↓って↑積↑↓つ↓み↑上↑↓あ↓げたのに、もう↑崩↑↓|くず↓す|の？もったいない！
sdata.e: After all that effort to build it up, you're already going to knock it down? What a waste!
